ratings.comment: Cannot speak more highly about GWS 103. Such important information was conveyed perfectly during lectures in a way that was easy to understand. The professor was very engaging and made me feel like they actually cared about my success.

Professor Frerichs is the best person on the planet and really cares about their students. They made the pandemic so much less stressful for me, which is saying a lot when other teaches made it hell. Thank you Emme<3

Emi is very accommodating to her students and shows that she really cares. She genuinely wants you to get a lot out of the class. She does assign a lot of work but you do not have to read all of it to do well on quizzes, tests, and discussion boards. Everything is open-note and she gives plenty of chances for extra credit. I would recommend her.
Shes amazing and so dedicated to work and ensuring student success
Lots of reading,but the material is super interesting! Emi is incredibly understanding and supportive!
Amazing class just a lot of work

The course itself is very reading heavy and takes up more time. However, the quizzes and discussion posts were very easy and midterm/final tests were recycled quiz questions. She is very caring and can be lenient with deadlines if there were outside circumstances. This course is an easy A.

Emi is an incredible and knowledgeable instructor. I could not recommend her and her classes enough! She goes above and beyond to make sure you know the material, making quizzes (online & open note) and papers a breeze. You can tell she knows her stuff and provides excellent feedback. Lecture is mandatory but she's flexible, and you'll want to go!
Id tap that as in a keg like Id like to party with her just kidding dont take this seriously Im a random person with random stuff have a nice day

This class is graded on a combination of class participation and personal improvement throughout the course. There are some book assingments and essays but generally light on homework. Emi is amazing and really cares about her students. She will work with you to help you understand things, gives great feedback, and brings a fun energy to class :)

I love Emi soooooo much omg. She was an amazing gem passionate about music, movies, literature, and spanish and she really brought that into the classroom setting. As long as you put effort into your work its an easy gpa booster.

I was nervous about taking Spanish 226, so I am very glad Emi was my TA. She made learning the grammar and writing concepts much easier and is always looking for ways to help you improve. Highly recommend as a TA and a person!

She really goes out of her way to be kind and understanding, and she's a fair grader. She doesn't get pissed if you don't understand what she's saying in Spanish and she'll explain it in English. Would highly recommend her for 226!

Emi is on top of things, approachable, and creates a very comfortable environment for Spanish 226. It's a writing course, and Emi is perfect because she takes each essay and gives very helpful feedback on the grammar, structure, and content. She really cares about both your success in the class and your progress as a student in general.

Emi is definitely one of the great teachers to be found at UW-Madison. Her attitude is always positive and caring. She is very intelligent and does a great job facilitating awesome in class discussion. The class itself is very easy if you put forward a good effort.

Profe Emi was absolutely fantastic. She's hilarious, really cares about the well-being of her students, and makes class enjoyable and fun. I'm absolutely awful at Spanish, but by the end of the semester I felt a lot more confident in speaking the language. Overall, she's my favorite professor so far.

Emi is an excellent instructor. Her lectures and grading are very clear and if she senses her students are struggling to understand something she will focus on it more. She's more than willing to help outside of class, not to mention she's hilarious and kind to her students. She made Spanish very enjoyable. As long as you show up you will do well.

I absolutely LOVED having Emi for Spanish! She is an incredible teacher and person in general. She is known for her sailor mouth, which makes her even more of an enjoyable person to be around. Emi explains the more difficult grammatical rules perfectly in a way everyone can understand and never loses her temper with those who struggle.
It's obvious that she just wants everyone to do their best and is so incredibly caring. Easy homework and a decent amount of writing, but no writing assignments are hard or stressful.

Emi is by far the best teacher I've had in all my years of school. She is funny, explains the material well, and best of all she cares about her students. She is willing to talk to you about anything, Spanish, your personal life, etc. I was lucky enough to have her for two semesters and I would 10/10 recommend.

Emi understands what it's like to be a college student and doesn't waste our time. She is hilarious in class and is known for her sailor mouth - but she is also very respectful of all of her students and genuinely cares. She is a very fair grader as well. Lectures were a blast and she rekindled my faith in the Spanish department. Take this class!

Emi is the reason I did well in Spanish this semester. I have always struggled with Spanish, but decided to take it to get some retro credits. She's helpful, funny, and has the ability to put herself in your shoes because she is a student as well. She took time out of her day and helped me multiple times 1 on 1. Seriously, thank you Emi.

Emi is amazing! Her approach helps anybody learn and she is always available for help if you need it. She truly cares for her students and wants everyone to not only pass the class but become more knowledgable and passionate about the language. She is an easy grader and will correct mistakes but not necessarily penalize you. Would recommend 110%.

Emi was the highlight of my day. She had a great sense of humor and didn't make us stay in class if she knew we'd got the concepts (aka we always got out 15 mins early). Had a mouth of a sailor which lightened the mood. She understood that we were college kids, but wanted us to be safe. She really cared about us doing well in the class.

Honestly the best professorTA I've ever had. I took her class when I was a freshman and am now a sophomore and am still in contact with her. She makes class interesting and really knows what she's talking about, and to top that she is really hilarious.

Exactly who you want for a Spanish teacher. Hilarious in class, but if you ever ask her questions 1 on 1, she'll explain grammar concepts like no other. She earnestly wants her students to do well, and actually learn some Spanish. She can make a dead class in Wisconsin come alive in Spain. Congratulations on her recent marriage.

I only took Spanish for the retro credits but she made me consider continuing. It was my favorite class this semester. She would give helpful hints for test, made sure everyone in the class knew what was going on, and wanted everyone to get a good grade

Emi is super friendly and helpful! She makes it a fun and enjoyable learning atmosphere. She is not a super tough grader but she will mark you down if you're wrong obviously; her end goal is just for you to learn and to become a better Spanish speaker. She is very approachable and always welcomes questions. One of my favorite classes this semester!

Emi is an amazing teacher. She is easy to understand, extremely helpful and goes out of her way to make sure her students do well. She is also very funny and makes the atmosphere very welcoming, an essential trait in a foreign language teacher. Overall this class was one of my favorites at UW!

Emi is such a good spanish teacher. She really cares about her students, and wants everyone to do well in the class. She is very good at Spanish, and the class is completely taught in Spanish, but there are a few times when she'll allow a little bit of clarity in English. Very good teacher!!
